function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Failure to detect and mitigate disruptive events","Impact":"Adverse impact on networked systems and communities","Mitigation":"Improved early detection systems and response protocols","Technologies":"Surveillance systems, real-time monitoring, alert systems","People":"Communities, transportation networks, economic networks","Owner":"Department of Homeland Security, emergency response organizations"},{"Description":"Inability to prevent or absorb undesired events","Impact":"Devastating consequences on transportation and economic networks","Mitigation":"Development of resilient infrastructure and supply chain networks","Technologies":"Smart infrastructure, sustainable design, disaster-resistant construction","People":"Transportation systems, economic networks, global supply chain networks","Owner":"Infrastructure planners, construction companies, global supply chain organizations"},{"Description":"Failure of resilience strategies in response to large-scale events","Impact":"Disruption of global supply chain networks and emergency response systems","Mitigation":"Enhanced preparedness, response, and recovery planning","Technologies":"Crisis management software, communication systems, disaster recovery tools","People":"Global supply chain networks, emergency response organizations","Owner":"Department of Homeland Security, emergency response organizations"}]}
